casebody.data:
John D. WARD, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES No. 19-6818 Supreme Court of the United States. February 24, 2020

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied. Justice Sotomayor, with whom Justice Ginsburg joins, dissenting from the denial of certiorari: I dissent for the reasons set out in *2627Brown v. United States, 586 U.S. ---- (2018) (Sotomayor, J., dissenting).
